name: Shooting Dragon Heroes
description:
Shooting Dragon Heroes is full action pack shooting, hunting and survival challenging game. It’s a day of attack, your town is on serious threat from dragons they will destroy everything in the town. Each level is tougher and more thrilling than previous. To play next level you have to unlock it by completing the previous level. While shooting and killing dragons be careful they are very dangerous creature they will attack you and kill you. It might looks similar to Dinosaur hunting or any shooting game but in dragon hunting game dragons can throw fire flames and burn you.

Features:
Variety of dragons & interesting levels to play
Addictive dragon sniper shooting experience
Historic and heart touching gameplay sound
Amazing hunting missions
Shoot all dragons one by one by tapping the gun shooting icon
